title: Life Cycles
description: Life takes many different forms, and every form of life follows a cycle. Some life cycles are simple, while others are complex. Life Cycles introduces students to a variety of life cycles, including frogs, elephants, humans, insects, and giant sequoias. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast as well as identify plural nouns.
